channel.title: CVE Feed for ZEXELON CO., LTD. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ZEXELON CO., LTD. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-41720|2024-08-05T18:45:55.646Z -- zexelon%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- zwx-2000csw2-hn
item.description: Incorrect permission assignment for critical resource issue exists in ZWX-2000CSW2-HN firmware versions prior to Ver.0.3.15, which may allow a network-adjacent authenticated attacker to alter the configuration of the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-41720|2024-08-05T04:36:17.042Z -- zexelon%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- zwx-2000csw2-hn
item.description: Incorrect permission assignment for critical resource issue exists in ZWX-2000CSW2-HN firmware versions prior to Ver.0.3.15, which may allow a network-adjacent authenticated attacker to alter the configuration of the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-39838|2024-08-05T04:35:39.287Z -- zexelon%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- zwx-2000csw2-hn
item.description: ZWX-2000CSW2-HN firmware versions prior to Ver.0.3.15 uses hard-coded credentials, which may allow a network-adjacent attacker with an administrative privilege to alter the configuration of the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-39838|2024-08-05T13:27:13.109Z -- zexelon%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- zwx-2000csw2-hn
item.description: ZWX-2000CSW2-HN firmware versions prior to Ver.0.3.15 uses hard-coded credentials, which may allow a network-adjacent attacker with an administrative privilege to alter the configuration of the device.
